#### The published [paper](https://www.pnas.org/doi/abs/10.1073/pnas.1913308116) is available on-line.

Here we present an opinion piece on the importance of accounting for all food systems and pressures for understanding the true environmental impact of food production, and subsequent sustainability implications.
